subject: fix: add app/+html.tsx so PWA manifest link appears in served HTML
body:
Expo Router with output: "static" ignores web/index.html and generates
its own HTML. The manifest link, PWA meta tags, and OneSignal setup
never made it into the actual page, so Chrome couldn't fire
beforeinstallprompt. Created app/+html.tsx (Expo Router's standard
HTML customization mechanism) with all necessary head content.

https://claude.ai/code/session_0121eGTTB8ExkCz2aikbkCER
title: add app/+html.tsx so PWA manifest link appears in served HTML
